summary: Core routing and UI pages (Home/Intake/Billing) plus a shared Header navigation with exactly two menu items are implemented, along with a cohesive teal/green theme via Tailwind CSS variables. However, the required generated static image files themselves are not evidenced as added under frontend/public/assets/generated, and several unrequested authentication/actor/react-query utilities were introduced despite being listed as non-goals.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add the required generated static images under frontend/public/assets/generated with the exact filenames, and render them in the UI without serving from backend.
missing_requirements.reason: The UI references the generated image paths, but the diff summary does not show the actual image files being added under frontend/public/assets/generated, so existence with exact filenames cannot be verified from the provided changes.

hallucinated_features.description: Internet Identity authentication provider and related authentication hook implementation.
hallucinated_features.reason: Authentication/authorization flows (e.g., Internet Identity) were explicitly listed as non-goals unless requested later, but an InternetIdentityProvider and substantial auth-client logic were added and wired into the app root.

hallucinated_features.description: Backend actor access hook with React Query (useActor) and implied authenticated/anonymous actor creation behavior.
hallucinated_features.reason: Backend changes were to be added only if strictly necessary for the requested UI; the BuildRequest did not request backend interaction, yet a useActor hook using identity and React Query was added.
Not requested by the BuildRequest; adds external link and tracking parameters beyond the specified pages/routes/theme/images.
